body:
Hello wonderful forum.  I am trying to export gbxml files from a tutorial i am following and I get these errors when I plug my hbzones into grizzlybear:  1. Cannot find a gbXML folder or any dependencies. Create a folder at C:\gbXML.Then click on the link below to download dependencies. Copy these into this folder after downloading.
2. [https://www.dropbox.com/sh/vaklarrhw9tylg4/AACBaYtBPIHkNj2QC82E7jgSa](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/vaklarrhw9tylg4/AACBaYtBPIHkNj2QC82E7jgSa) This dropbox file seems to have been moved or deleted... any advice?  Thanks

replies.body: Hi Ethan! Sorry for the late reply. We should update Grizzly Bear and the links.
